2085330.name: PolyRoyale
2085330.description:
PolyRoyale: The Ultimate Battle Royale Experience


PolyRoyale is an entertaining mini-game, perfect for social gatherings. As a user, you create a lobby where your friends can join (p2p network) to engage in a thrilling battle together with you.

Jump, Land, Fight!

Engage in battle against up to 32 players in Battle Royale or Endless Deathmatch modes. Experience action-packed combat on customized PolyRoyale maps, either solo or as part of a team. You'll encounter both AI-controlled bots and seasoned players. Armed with a variety of weapons, customize your character's appearance at the outset. Be prepared to jump from an aircraft, soar through the skies, and find the best landing spot. Show that you're a true survivor because, in the end, only one can emerge victorious!

  • Achieve impressive milestones (Achievements) for your outstanding performance.

Battle Royale
Face the challenge and battle for supremacy in Solo, Duo, or Squad modes. But beware, you're trapped in a shrinking cylinder that constantly changes its position!

Endless Deathmatch
In Endless Deathmatch, players engage in an endless battle against each other. Here, you have the option to compete solo, as a duo, or within a squad!

Key Features:

  • AI-controlled bots
  • Battle Royale mode
  • Endless Deathmatch mode
  • Game modes: Solo, Duo, Squad
  • Diverse arsenal of weapons
  • Custom character customization
  • Varied maps
  • A limited selection of vehicles
  • Customizable player count (system-dependent)
  • Online connectivity via P2P network
2085330.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 法语, 波兰语, 土耳其语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 意大利语, 芬兰语, 瑞典语, 荷兰语, 丹麦语, 挪威语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 保加利亚语, 简体中文, 俄语, 日语, 匈牙利语, 越南语
*具有完全音频支持的语言

highlighted.name: JUMP OUT OF THE PLANE 50 TIMES
